description: fol. 1b-9b. 185 x 134; 150 x 100 mm. 21 lin. 3 Shawwāl 577, al-ḥasan ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Aḥmad al-Khūʼī (?); on fol. 9b-10a the copyistʼs samāʻ dat. 4 Shawwāl 577, signed by the author; on fol. 1a three other samāʻ notes. Incip.: ... الحمد لله المسبح الممجد المهلل الموحد ... وبعد فقد وردت رغاىب First ḥadīth: ... عن ابى هرىرة قال سأل رجل رسول الله ... اى العمل افضل فقال اىمان بالله ...
author: Ṭāliqānī, Aḥmad ibn Ismāʻīl, d. 1193

title.@value: Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn fī al-ajwibah al-nabawīyah ʻan al-asʼilah al-dīnīyah

creator: Ṭāliqānī, Aḥmad ibn Ismāʻīl, d. 1193
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
